title: System Configuration Manifest (SCM)
description: The definitive, cryptographically-bound state snapshot following a GSEP evolution.

scmRootHash.description: SHA3-512^2 hash of the complete SCM payload.

coreArtifacts.description: The integrity artifacts ingested by SSP-01.
